Bafia: Mɛ̀ Pol, ɓɛɛ Silas rì Timote, tì kàni ɓumɓɛ ɓi Kìseŋi ki a Tesalonika ki ki ri ɓi Bɛ̀ll Seŋi rì ɓi Yeesus Kiris Kan. Geesɛ̀n, rì fyòoog ɓyɛɛ ɓa ɓìfayɛn a lɔ̀ŋkin.
Ɓisiì fafa lɔŋ Bɛ̀ll ɓìtògsɛ̀n cààmɛ̀n kìcèm ɓisu wiǹ mìniìcèm, tì ki ɓùŋɓuŋ mini ɓi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n yis.

Ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll à Seŋi wìs tì ti tì yitàg ɓyààmɛ̀n ɓìcèm mɛ̀kìkìì min mɛ ɓi rìgherɛ̀n, rì kìsay ki ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n wiǹ a kìkì, rì rìsììrɛ̀n ɗin ɓi dyàɓɛn inɛ tì rì rì yɔ̀ ɓì Kan wìs Yeesus Kiris.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, tì yii lɛ Bɛ̀ll à keesìghà mìni, à ki ɓɔ̀n mini.

Ɓisuulɛ tì ghagsìghà ɓi mini Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ ànɛ tì ɓaghày rì nyi rì jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì ŋwɔm yɔ̀ ri yɔ̀, tì ghagsìghà girig nyi ɓi dàm yi tì kìkìghà rì ìteɗ wu Kitɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay, tì ki konag kiyiì saaɗ bimiɗ ànɛ ɓi Ɓɔlɛ ànɛ̀n. Ɓi saaɗ, ɓì yii cɛɓ ki tì ghɛɓkà ɓi nyìinyìm wìn; fɔlɔɔ a ɓaghà ɓi kìrɔɔ kin.
Ɓì nɔ̀ɔ̀tìghà lɛ rì mɛ̀kòò mis, rì mɛ̀kòò mɛ Kan, ɓì ki tulɛn rì mɛ̀tɔɓ lɛɛ̀gwey yɛ̀ɛ bì ghàɓkà Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ rì kìnyàà ki Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay kɛɛ̀ falàg.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓì ti kìfèèghrɛnà ɓisuu ɓɛgherɛ̀n ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ a Masedwan, rì ɓɛ a Akayi.

Lɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Kan ì mɛ pɛ̀sɛn yi a lɔ̀ŋkin, ì kpaŋ à Masedwan rì a Akayi, nni àa lɔŋ foo nyi rì nyi, gom ì rìgherɛ̀n ɗin ɗi ɓì gherɛɛ Bɛ̀ll, ì mɛ sàà jàŋ bimiɗ à kpaŋ ɓi lèg ànɛ tì yin gi lɛ tì kpaakpàà.
Ɓum ɓɛɛ̀ kpaakpaa righàɓ ɗi ɓì ghàɓkà ɓìsi yɛ̀ɛ tì kpagà a lɔ̀ŋkin rì yɛ̀ɛ ɓì càɗkàkày ɓìnùn, ɓì lɔ̀ɔ̀ghrɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ Bɛ̀ll lɛ ɓi ɓɔgsi nyi, lɛ nnyɛɛ ri kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀ à Bɛ̀ll ànɛ a rì cem,
ɓì ɓoŋɓòŋ lɛ Man wiì Yeesus, ànɛ à ghèmzìghày a ɓìloŋ, a sɛǹ yì aɗyoo, di a kweɗ ɓìsi ɓi rìbaŋì ɗi Bɛ̀ll ɗi ɗi riì.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, mìniìɓɔmiɗ ɓì yii lɛ, rìyù ɗi tì yùghà a lɔ̀ŋkin ɗi wughà ɓi zɛy.

Di tì ka kpaŋ ɓi a lɔ̀ŋkin, tì ghɛngà mɛ̀tɔɓ, ɓum ɓɛ ki yeesi ɓisi a Filiɓ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓì yii, wɔ̀lɛ Bɛ̀ll à faghà ɓìsi ìtèɗ wulɛ ti ghagsi mìni Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ wìì nsoò yɛ̀ɛ ki ɓaghà bimiɗ à wɛ̀y.
Ɓìɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll ɓi tì kakàlìghà ɓum ɓi rooghày ɓi ǹɗuŋ ɓi rìnàn ǹsoò lɛ ɓi ɓìɓan ɓi tifin, fɔɔnnɛ ɓi ki yin ɗi ǹ-yègsɛ̀n.

Wɔ̀lɛ Bɛ̀ll à timgà rìɓa ɗis à ki fa ɓisi kìsay ki Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ. Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ tì yin ɓiì kpaakpaa ɓiɓan ɓi Bɛ̀ll lɛ ti puɓsi ɓum mɛ̀rem, kìɓan kìfog, ti kpaakpaa ɓi ɓyɛɛ̀ kɔ̀ngi Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à ti à ghɛngì yɛ̀ɛ mɛ̀rem mɛ ɓum, mɛ ri ɓi ɗùm.
Ɓì yii lɛ tì ka ɓaghà ɓi ri jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì fìɗyɛɓi, nsoò rìyitì ɗi lɛ ti fɔǹ mɔ̀ɔ̀ni ŋwos adɛŋ, Bɛ̀ll à rì ɓìsi wusìnɛ̀ɗ.
Tì kaaghà ɓi lɛ ɓum ɓɛɛ kemzi ɓisi, nsoò a lɔ̀ŋkin, nsoò a ɓum ɓɛm̀bog, kɔlɛ tì ɓaghà lɛ tì làmì mìni ɓi-tèɗ ɓi ɗii ɗi lɛ ɓɛ̀kɛ̀nì-fìtom ɓɛ Kiris.
Wɔ̀lɛ tì ghɛɓkà ɓi nyìinyìm wìn rì nɗem wu tɛ̀tɛ̀rɛ̀ɛ̀ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ jɛɛ ɓɔn à ti à ɓègì ɓɔn ɓii.

Ɓi rìkeesì ɗi tì keesìghà mìni, àa Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à Bɛ̀ll nyi rì nyi innɛ tì ɓaghà lɛ tì kɔ̀n lɛ ti fa mìni, ti ɓaghà lɛ ti fa mìni lɔŋ lɛ rì ɓyɛɓ ɓis miì, lɛ ɓì ɓaghà di ɓì ti ɓum ɓis ɓɛ nɗem lɛ kɔɔ̀kɔɔ̀.

Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀ ɓì rì lɛ ɓì yitì kìsay ki tì kìghà, rì ǹtɔɓ wu tì wokà; tì ghagsìghà mìni Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à Bɛ̀ll tì ki sasay lɛ rì ìru rì ŋwos lɛ ǹtɛ̀g wis wɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ siŋ wààdɛŋ ɓi nyòò.
Ɓì rì ɓɛ̀wusìnɛ̀ɗ ɓis, nsoò Bɛ̀ll à rì girig wusìnɛ̀ɗ lɛ cɛɓ ki tì ghɛɓkà rì mìni ɓɛ ɓì rì ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ki ɓaghà kìtɛnɛn, kɔ tì lɛ saaɗ, kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìɓan kifenɛn miì.
Ɓì yii girig lɛ tì ghɛɓkà rì mum ǹcèm ànɛ ɓi mìni fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ seŋi à rì lɛ à ghɛɓ rì ɓɔn ɓii.
Tì kìghà lɛ tì reɓ mìni, tì fɔɔsì mìni mɛ̀rem, tì ki ɓɔ̀ɔɓɔ̀ŋzì mìni lɛ ɓi ghɛɓ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ kɛɛ̀ kɔ̀ngi Bɛ̀ll ànɛ a regi mini lɛ ɓi ɓa rì gàɓ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kii, rì ɓi rìkem ɗii.

Kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ̀ki tì fafa Bɛ̀ll ɓìtògsɛ̀n cààmɛ̀n kìcèm lɛ, yɛ̀ɛ bì ghàɓkà jɛ̀ɛ̀ yìì ìnɛ tì wogsìghà mìni, ɓì ghàɓkà ɓi yɔ̀ yɛ̀ɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì mum; ɓì ghàɓkà lɔŋ yɔ̀ yɛ̀ɛ ì rì a tààkaà, lɛ ì rì jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll ìnɛ yɛ̀ɛ kìki kisay ɓi mìni ɓɛ ɓì rì ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, ɓì mɛ pisɛn Ɓiseŋi ɓi Bɛ̀ll ɓi ɓi ri a Zyude ɓi Yeesus Kiris, ɓisuulɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓi kìlɔ̀ŋ kin ɓɛ yeesìghà mìni lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛroɓɛ a Zyude ɓɛ yeesìghà ɓɛ̀gherɛ̀n ɓɛ wɔ̀ɔ̀.
Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n ɓɛǹ ɓɛɛ wolà Kan Yeesus, ɓɛ ki cuusi ɓɛ̀kpaŋzì-ɓìɓan, ɓɛɛ yeeyèèsìghà ɓìsi; ɓɛ ti ɓɛ ɓeɓkì Bɛ̀ll, ɓɛ ki ɓèèzag ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm.

Ɓɛ ti ɓɛ rekì ɓìsi lɛ tyɛ̀ ki ghagsi jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Bɛ̀ll a ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin Ɓɛ̀yudɛ̀n lɛ ɓɛɛ ɓa rì cɛɓ. Rìkì ɗiǹ ɗyɛɛ̀ɗi ɓɛɛ̀ kɛ̀nkɛn beèbɛ̀y ɓɛ teètègsì kìɓe kaa cààmɛ̀n kìcèm rì ɗyɔ̀; wɔ̀lɛ rìbaŋì ɗi Bɛ̀ll ɗi mɛ syɔn ɓɔ kìkòmi.

Ɓi san wìs, yɛ̀ɛ tì ghasɛ̀ngà rì mìni tyɛ̀ ki ghɛnɛn ti a mɛ̀su ɓi maa cààmɛ̀n, fɔlɔɔ kɛ̀ɛ ki rèsi lɛ tì ti tyɛ̀ ki fègti mini, ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, tìi nɗì rì coo zày ìnɛ lɛ ti ghɛnɛn tì rì mìni, fɔɔnnɛ tìi ǹtèèsii nyoo lɛɛ̀gwey lɛ kìɓan kiǹ kɛɛ kilɛn.
Tì kɔ̀ngà lɔŋ lɛ di tyàa yùu foo, a lɔ̀ŋkin mɛ̀ɛmiɗ Pol ǹfèèghrɛɛ gɛ̀n yɛ̀ɛ yiɓɛɛ̀, wɔ̀lɛ Satàn a règ ɓìsi rìyù.
Ghɛn yɛɛrì min ɓiì ɓaà dyàɓɛn yìs, rì kìnyàà kis nsoò lɛ tàm wìs a rìkem ɓi mis mɛ Kan wìs Yeesus, ŋwosi risugtìì ɗii? Àa lɔŋ mìni yɛɛ rì ɓa wa?
Ɛ̀ɛ̀, mìni yɛɛ ri rìkem ɗis, rì kìnyàà kis.
Yɛ̀ɛ tìi n-yiidi lɛ tì cenɛ̀n lɛ ti ɓoŋɓoŋ tì, nni tìi nghɛɛ kìrɔɔ lɛ, ti rɔɓ a Atɛn ɓìsi cɛ̀ncis.
Fɔɔnnɛ tìi nɗomiì mìni geni wìs Timote, ànɛ à rì ǹkìì-kìsay a Bɛ̀ll ɓi rìghagsì ɗi Syeesyee à Ɓɔlɛ à Kiris lɛ a fa mìni ìtèɗ, à ki fegsi mìni ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɗin;
lɛ di mum kɛ̀ɛ càrɛn lɛ mɛ̀fèèghrɛn mɛ mɛ ri ɓigomìnɛ mɛɛ ɓigti nyi, ɓisuulɛ mìniìɓɔmiɗ ɓì yii lɛ mɛ̀fèèghrɛn mɛǹ mɛ ɓaghà mɛ̀pègsɛn ɓisu wis.
Yɛ̀ɛ tì ɓaghà a lɔ̀ŋkin, tì lokà mìni ki rèsii lɛ tì rì ɓiì tanɛɛ rì mɛ̀fèèghrɛn, fɔɔnnɛ ki ki kìlɛ̀ngà fɔlɔɔ yɛ̀ɛ ɓì yii.

Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ yɛ̀ɛ m̀ɓatìghà ɓi lɛ m̀ɓoŋɓòŋ tì nni ǹɗomgày Timote lɛ a yu kìwoògh lannɛ rìgherɛ̀n ɗin ɗyɛɛ̀ kɛ̀ɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀, lɛ ǹɗirìsìghà lɛ kɛ̀ kɛ̀ɛ ɓa lɛ ǹfèèghrɛ̀n-ɓum à fèèghrɛ̀ngà mìni lɛ kìsay kis kɛɛ wu zɛy.

Wɔ̀lɛ ɓigomìnɛ nnɛ Timote à sughiì rìkɛ̀ɛ̀ ɗi àa nɗìì a lɔ̀ŋkin; à sughiì ɓìsi rì ɓɛ̀ɓɔlɛ ɓɛsyeesyee ɓɛ ɓɛ komi lɛ rì rìgherɛ̀n ɗin, rì ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ànɛ ɓì rì rì nyi. À kpaa ɓìsi yɛ̀ɛ mìniì ka yiiyitàg lɔŋ ɓisi rì nkɔ̀nɛ̀n cààmɛ̀n kìcèm, ɓì ki ɓa ri zày ìnɛ lɛ ɓi ghɛǹ ɓìsi, yɛ̀ɛ ɓìsi girig tì rì rì zày ìnɛ lɛ ti ghɛnɛn.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, fɔɔnnɛ ɓìi nfaa ɓìsi ìtèɗ ɓi nyoo rì rìgherɛ̀n ɗin, ɓi nyìinyìm à mɛ̀tɔɓ rì mɛ̀fèèghrɛn mɛcèm mɛ tì rì rì mɔ.
Nni ɓigomìnɛ ki ri yɛ̀ɛ tì teetii tì cɛɓ yɛ̀ɛ tì woogh lɛ ɓì kaka lɔŋ ɓɛsììrɛn ɓi Kan.
Tì rì lɛ tì tògsàg Bɛ̀ll wìs ɓisu win à kpaŋ fe, ɓi kìnyàà kìcèm ki tì rì rì kɔ ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll ɓisuu righerɛ̀n ɗin!
Ti ɓɔ̀ɔɓɔ̀ŋzì yɛ̀ɛ ìru yɛ̀ɛ ŋwos, tì ki sììrɛn ɓi bɔ̀ŋzɛ̀n lɛ a ki lɛ ti ghɛnag tì a mɛ̀su, à ki roozi ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi kaarɛɛ ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɗin?
Bɛ̀ll à Seŋi wìs nyimiɗ, rì Kan wìs Yeesus, ɓɛɛ ɓaà ɓìsi bee ìnɛ tì rì lɛ tì kpaŋ miì a lɔ̀ŋkin.
Kan a tegsi ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ànɛ ɓì rì rì nyi, lɛ a roǹ à sòsòɓ ɓi nyìinyìm wìn, à kòm ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm, à ki ɓa fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ànɛ ɓisii ri rì nyi ɓi san wìn.
A ki lɛ mɛ̀rem min mɛɛ siìrɛn, mɛ ɓa mɛ̀ tɛnɛn, kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìɓan ki ɓɛ rì lɛ ɓɛ fen miì ɓi mis mɛ Bɛ̀ll à Seŋi wìs, ŋwosi risugtìì ɗi Kan wìs Yeesus ǹɗaŋ rì ɓum ɓii ɓɛ̀cèm, ɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓɛ̀tɛnɛn.

Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, ti siìtɛn kìkpaà lɛ ɓì yilàkà rìkuu ɗi cɛɓ ɗi ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ghɛɓì lɛ Bɛ̀ll a wog kìrɔɔ rì mìni, a lɔ̀ŋkis nni cɛɓ kìn kɛɛ̀ki ɓi ghɛghɛ̀ɓ; tì ɓɔ̀ŋzaagh mìni, tì ki yɛ̀gsi mini ɓyàg ɓi ɗii ɗi Kan Yeesus lɛ ɓi teèsi tì nyoo rì rìkuu ɗi cɛɓ ɗìn à cee fɔlɔɔ.
Ɓisuulɛ ɓì yii ɓìɓan ɓi tì siitàkà mìni; ɓi ɓaghà ɓìɓan ɓi ɓi riì yɛ̀ɛ Kan Yeesus.
Rìkɔ̀n ɗi Bɛ̀ll ɗi ri lɛ ɓi ghɛɓ cɛɓ ki tɛnɛn, ɓì cèlì ɓìɓan ɓi tifin.
Mum ǹcèm ànɛ ɓi mìni, à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kìyiì rìɓèŋ ɗi nyoo yìì ɓi rìtɛn , à ɓèŋɗɛ̀n lɛ a ɓa mum à saaɗ, ɗì rìmum;
kɛ̀ɛ càrɛn lɛ ɓiɓeɓtàg ɓi ɓiɓan ɓyɛɛ syòŋ nyi ǹɗem, yɛ̀ɛ ki ti ki ɓalàg rì ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin ɓɛgherɛ̀n ɓɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ ki yi Bɛ̀ll.
Ɓi kìɓan kiǹ ŋwaàɗɛŋ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi ki yègsiì geni, nsoò lɛ à kì nyi kìɓeɓtàg ki nɗem, lɛ Kan à ti à rɔ̀gì ɓìɓan ɓiǹ lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ tì mɛ kì lɛ, tì kpaa mìni, tì ki rèsi mini.
Bɛ̀ll à reŋìghà ɓi ɓisi lɛ ti ghɛɓ cɛɓ ki kitɔɓì, wɔ̀lɛ à reŋìghà ɓìsi lɛ ti ghɛɓ cɛɓ ki tɛnɛn.
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ ŋwaànɛ à rì ɓiì ɓèni ɓìɓan ɓi nsiisiìtàg ɓi, a yi lɛ, àa mum ìnnɛ à ɓèni, lɔŋ Bɛ̀ll ànɛ à mɛ fa mini girig Kitɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n kii ki Nghay.
Ki ghɛɓsii ɓi com lɛ ti kaǹ mìni kìɓan ki ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n à rìgeni, ɓisuulɛ Bɛ̀ll nyimiɗ a rèsàkà mìni kìɓan ki ɓi ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ànɛ à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓaà ɓi nyìinyìm wìn.
Ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ànɛn innɛ ɓi rèresi rì ɓɛ̀geni ɓin ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓɛ ri Masedwan bimiɗ. Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, ɓisii yɛgsii lɔŋ mini ɓyàg lɛ ɓi kɛɛ̀di beèbɛ̀y rì rìkì ɗiǹ.
Ɓì foŋ ǹɗem ɓi kìɓan ki lɛ ɓi ghɛ̀ɓ lɛ fyòoog, ɓì kìkì ɓìɓan ɓin ɓi mìniìɓɔmìɗ, ɓì ki sasay ri ɓyàg ɓin lɔŋ yɛ̀ɛ tì siŋdɛ̀ngà mìni;
di fɔɔnnɛ ɓumɓɛ ɓɛ yin ɓɛgherɛ̀n ɓɛɛ teɗ mìni rì rìmum, ǹtɛ̀g win wɛ̀ kɛɛ̀ rìɗ ŋwaàdɛŋ.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, tì kɔ̀ni ɓi lɛ ɓi ɓa lɛ dùŋdùŋ ɓi kìɓan ki ki seesee ɓɛroɓɛ ɓɛ ri ɓìloŋ lɛ di kɛ̀ ɓi ɓa lɛ mɛ̀rem min mɛ ɓeɓtɛ̀n ɓi mùm yɛ̀ɛ mɛ ɓum ɓɛm̀bog ɓɛ ɓɛ rì kɛ̀ɛ̀ dyàɓɛn.
Lɛ i tì gherɛɛ lɛ Yeesus à wughà, à ki ghèmɓɛn, ti gherɛɛna girig lɛ Bɛ̀ll à rì ɓiì ghèmzii ǹɗaŋ ri Yeesus, ɓɛroɓɛ ɓɛ gherɛ̀ngà nyi ɓɛ ɓaa wu.
Ɓisuulɛ com ki ti kpaaghì fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì Kan ì rì ki ri lɛ: Ɓìsi ɓɛ tì rì ɓiì ɓaà di tì kaka cem ɓi rìsugtìì ɗi Kan, tyàa syòŋ ɓi ɓɛroɓɛ ɓaa wu bee.
Ɓisuulɛ, yɛ̀ɛ jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì rì ɓìì toòghrɛɛ, jɛ̀ɛ̀ ì coo ŋwaà-fìtom, ɗyam ɗi Bɛ̀ll ɗi rɔŋ, Kan nyimiɗ a ɓiì sɛnìì aɗyòò; fɔɔnnɛ ɓìloŋ ɓi ɓi Kiris ɓi ɓiì loògh kì ghèmɓɛɛ.

Ajɛ̀m ìnɛn, ɓìsi ɓumɓɛ tì ɓiì ɓaà di tì kaka cem, ɓɛ rì ɓìsi ɓiì terì ǹɗaŋ ri ɓɔ, tì ɓɔg ɓi ɓìkwìɗ lɛ tì tuùsɛn rì Kan ɓi nlɛŋlɛŋ̀. Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ tì ɓiì kɔ̀kɔrii ri Kan cààmɛ̀n kìcèm.
Ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ lɛ ɓì fɔɔ̀fɔ̀ɔ̀sɛ̀n mìniìɓɔmiɗ mɛrem rì ɓìɓan ɓiǹ.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, kìɓan ki ki seesee cààmɛ̀n, nsoò lɛ gòn inɛ ɓìɓan ɓiǹ ɓi ri ɓiì kìlɛɛ, ki yiìdi lɛ ɓɛ kaǹ mìni kɔ.
Ɓisuulɛ mìniìɓɔmiɗ ɓì konaagh kì yiì lɛ ŋwos a Kan à rì ɓiì kpaŋì fɛlɛ yɛɛ wiiwìì à ti à yùlàg rì ìru.

Cààmɛ̀n ki yɛ̀ɛ ɓum ɓɛ ɓiì kpaakpaa lɛ fyòomà fi ri lɛ fyòoog kɛ̀ɛ̀ kìɓan ki risiyɛn kɛɛ̀ki ɓɛ rì ɓiì sìgmɛɛ lɛ cuu ki mɛ sɛn ɓi ɓɔ fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ rìkɛŋ ɗi riyay ɗi ti ɗi siɗkì giɓ a ɗyem. Ɓaa ɓa ɓi ri bee ì ǹlɛghɛn cuu kìn.
Wɔ̀lɛ ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, mìnii yin ɓi birìm, fɔɔnnɛ ŋwos anɛ̀n à ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi mini kì sìri yɛ̀ɛ wiiwìì.
Mìniìcèm ɓì rì ɓɔn ɓɛ ɓi kìtɛɛtɛn, ɓì ɓa ti ɓɔn ɓɛ ɓi cààmɛ̀n à ŋwos; ɓìsiì yin ɓɔn ɓɛ ɓi cààmɛ̀n à ìru, nsoò lɛ ɓɛ ɓi birìm.
Fɔlɔɔ nnɛ tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ ɓi min kilalì yɛ̀ɛ ɓɛro ɓɛm̀bog; ti kɔ̀riina lɔŋ cem, tì ɓèŋɗɛ̀n ɓi kìɓan ki mɛrɔ̀g.
Ɓisuulɛ, ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ lalày, ɓɛ ti ɓɛ laayì rì ìru, ɓɛ̀ŋwaŋì mɛ̀rɔ̀g, ɓɛ ŋwagì rì ìru.

Wɔ̀lɛ ɓìsi ɓɛ tì rì ɓɔn ɓɛ ɓi cààmɛ̀n à ŋwos, tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì ɓèŋɗɛɛ ɓi kìɓan ki mɛrɔ̀g, tì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì pùrɛɛ rìgherɛ̀n rì ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n fɛ lɛ yɛ̀ɛ kìlàà ki bɔŋ tì waatɛ̀n girig dyàɓɛn inɛ ɓi gòri yìs fɛlɛ yɛ̀ɛ tàm.
Ɓisuulɛ Bɛ̀ll à fèkà ɓi lɛ ti ɓa ɓumɓɛ bim yiì ì ɓiì rèsɛɛ a lɔ̀ŋkaa, wɔ̀lɛ à fèkà lɛ tì ɓiì ghɛɛ̀ gòri ì cɛɓ lɛ Kan wìs Yeesus Kiris,
ànɛ à wughà ɓisu wis lɛ ti ghɛɓ ɓɛ̀ràrɛn ɗì nyi, nsoò tyàa mɛ wu, nsoò tyàa kaka cem yɛ̀ɛ à risugtìì.
Fɔɔnnɛ ɓì ghɛ̀ɛ̀sɛɛ kì faafàlɛ̀n mìniìɓɔmiɗ ìtèɗ, ɓì kì feèfègsɛ̀n mìni rì mìni yɛ̀ɛ ɓì ti ɓiì kìkii.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, tì tɔɔgh mìni lɛ ɓi ɓalag rì bɔgsɛ̀n ɓi san ànɛ a ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ sasay ɓi nyìinyìn wìn, ɓɛ kɛɛ̀kɛ̀ɛ̀sì mìni ɓi cɛɓ ki Kan, ɓɛ ki rereɓ mini.
Terina ɓɔ rì coo nyaasɛ̀n lɛɛ̀gwey rì ǹkɔ̀nɛ̀n ɓisuu kìsay ki ɓɛɛ̀ kìkì. Ghɛbina lɛ fyòoog ɓi nyìinyìm wìn.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀! tì ɓɔ̀ŋzaagh mìni lɛ, ɓi rɔgsɛn ɓumɓɛ ɓɛɛ̀ ghɛghɛɓ ɓi kìɓùùsì , ɓì cààsì ɓɛ̀riris nyoo, ɓì lènlèm ɓɛroɓɛ ɓɛ yin ɗi ìtèɗ, ɓì yi rìnìɗ ɗi ǹɗem rì ɓum ɓɛ̀cèm.
Ɓì konàg lɛ ŋwaàdɛŋ kɛ̀ɛ ɓa lɛ à rɔ̀ŋ kiɓe ri kìɓe; wɔ̀lɛ kaana lɔŋ lɛ ɓi kiki kìrɔɔ cààmɛ̀n kìcèm, lɛ rì ɓi nyìinyìm wìn, rì ɓi ɓɛg ànɛ a ɓum ɓɛm̀bog ɓɛ̀cèm.
Nyàànyaana cààmɛ̀n kìcèm.
Ɓì ɓɔ̀ɔ̀ɓɔ̀ŋzì Bɛ̀ll kɛ̀ ɓi fɔy.
Faana Bɛ̀ll ɓìtògsɛ̀n ɓi ɓìɓan ɓìcèm ɓi ɓi tanɛɛ mìni, lɛ fɔlɔɔ yɛɛ ri rìkɔ̀n ɗii ɓi cɛɓ kin ki rì Yeesus Kiris.
Kɛ̀ ɓi ɓuɓsi Kìtɛntɛ̀ɛ̀n ki Nghay.
Kɛ̀ ɓi sɛɛti ɓiɓan ɓi ɓum ɓɛ kpaŋzii rì ìtèɗ wu Nghay à Bɛ̀ll.
Kìɓan kifog, fiɓɓaaghna ɓìɓan ɓìcèm lɛ syeesyee, ɓi ɓi rɔɔtɛɛ ɓyɛɛ̀ɓi ɓì ɓèŋ.
Lɛɛghna kìɓe mɛkuu mɛ̀cèm.

Bɛ̀ll ànɛ a falag fyòoog a tɛɛ̀zi mìni nyimiɗ bee yicèm, fɔɔnnɛ a ɓeŋ rìɓa ɗin ɗicèm ɗi lɛ: rì Nghay win, rì ǹɗem   win, rì nyoo yìn, kɛ̀ɛ̀ tìfin ɓisuu rìsugtìì ɗi Kan wìs Yeesus Kiris.
Roànɛ a regag mìni à rì ɓiì kìi kiɓan kiǹ ɓisuulɛ, à ti à roòzàg mɛ̀kàg mii.
Ɓɔɔsoŋ̀, ɓì ɓɔ̀ŋzàg girig ɓisu wis.
Ɓi tògsag ɓɛ̀geni ɓis ɓɛ ɓi rìgherɛ̀n ɓɛ̀cèm, ɓì lwɛ̀ɗkì ɓɔ yɛ̀ɛ kɛɛ̀ kɔ̀ngi Bɛ̀ll.
M̀ɓɔ̀ŋzaagh mìni ɓi ɗii ɗi Kan lɛ, ɓi ɓày kaàtà ànɛ ɓi mɛ̀reè mɛ ɓɛgeni ɓis ɓɛ̀cèm ɓɛ ɓi rìgherɛ̀n.
Geesɛ̀n ì Kan wìs Yeesus Kiris yɛ̀ɛ ɓa rì mìni.
